index.title: About me
index.aboutMeDescr: Hi, I'm Alan Quaino! I work as a web developer in a company that deals with optimization and management of warehouse logistics flows. I am a great car enthusiast, especially of youngtimers, and in my spare time I like to go outdoor and immerse myself in nature. If you want to know more, view my curriculum vitae or visit my social profiles.

interests.value: Cars, Nature, Sports, History, Technology, Travels

services.title: Services

development.title: Web development
development.descr: Design, development and deployment of websites and web applications

websites.title: Websites
websites.descr: Management, update and maintenance of existing websites

graphics.title: Graphics
graphics.descr: Design of logos, posters, banners and business cards

services.toolsDescr: I create websites with WordPress and WooCommerce, but I know how to develop my applications with frontend and backend frameworks like VueJS and Flask. I am also comfortable with graphics and video editing tools, such as Photoshop, Illustrator and Premiere.

projects.title: Projects
projects.projectsGridDescr: A brief list of my most recent works

contact.title: Contact
contact.contactFormDescr: Any idea? Send me an email by filling out the form below
contact.feedbackSuccess: Thank you for contacting me! I'll reply as soon as possible.
contact.feedbackError: There was an error sending the message. Try again later.
